original: @72a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @72a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: krishna ya m'a ri buddha s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri buddha s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Kṛṣṇayamāri-sadhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Attaining Black Yamāri Buddha

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.🔽To the guru, the unsurpassed lord,

original: bla ma rje btsun bla med dang // sku gsum mgon po gshegs nyid las //🔽btud de de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: bla ma rje btsun bla med dang // sku gsum mgon po gshegs nyid las // btud de de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: and to the protector of three buddha bodies,🔽having bowed,

original: blo dman bdag gis bshad par bya //
analyzed: blo dman bdag gis bshad par bya //
translated: I, of inferior intellect, will explain the means of accomplishing him.

original: sngags pa blo dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: sngags pa blo dang ldan pa yis //
translated: The wise practitioner

original: snying rje chen po rab bskyed de //
analyzed: snying rje chen po rab bskyed de //
translated: should generate great compassion

original: skad cig dran pas gsal bar bya //
analyzed: skad cig dran pas gsal bar bya //
translated: and visualize in an instant.

original: gnyis pas rdzogs pa thig le che //
analyzed: gnyis pas rdzogs pa thig le che //
translated: From the second, the perfect great drop,

original: bzang po nyid dang dpal gyi mgon //
analyzed: bzang po nyid dang dpal gyi mgon //
translated: the excellent one and the lord of glory

original: so so las kyang bzhi 'byung bya //
analyzed: so so las kyang bzhi 'byung bya //
translated: should each produce four.🔽Having completed and consecrated,

original: rdzogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang ; / mngon par btud la mchod byas te //
analyzed: rdzogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang ; / mngon par btud la mchod byas te //
translated: bowed, and made offerings,

original: ya yig sprul pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: ya yig sprul pa'i las bya'o //
translated: the action of the emanation syllable should be performed.

original: bshags dang rjes su yi rang dang // bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed che //
analyzed: bshags dang rjes su yi rang dang // bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed che //
translated: going for refuge, generating the great thought of awakening,

original: lus dbul yongs su bsngo ba bya'o //
analyzed: lus dbul yongs su bsngo ba bya'o //
translated: offering one's body, and dedication.

original: smon lam gdab dang gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: smon lam gdab dang gshegs su gsol //
translated: Make aspirations and request departure.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon song bas //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon song bas //
translated: Having gone before with the four Brahma abodes,

original: rnam thar gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgom //
analyzed: rnam thar gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgom //
translated: meditate on the nature of the three liberations.

original: aom sv'a bh'a shuddha dharm'a: bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom sv'a bh'a shuddha dharm'a: bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho 'haṃ.

original: gnas dang dag pa'i ngo bo dang // bde ba bzang po 'di bsgom bya //
analyzed: gnas dang dag pa'i ngo bo dang // bde ba bzang po 'di bsgom bya //
translated: Meditate on this pure essence of the excellent bliss.

original: sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bha wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bha wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Śūnyatājñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako 'ham.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ni //
translated: The nature of body, speech, and mind

original: yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor blta //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor blta //
translated: is seen as the essence of the three syllables.

original: dag pa'i thig le nam mkha' yi //
analyzed: dag pa'i thig le nam mkha' yi //
translated: The pure bindu, the continuum of space,

original: rgyun gyis gnas pa'i nyi ma h'um //
analyzed: rgyun gyis gnas pa'i nyi ma h'um //
translated: the sun of abiding, the hūṃ.

original: gyur pa rdo rje gzhal med khang //
analyzed: gyur pa rdo rje gzhal med khang //
translated: The transformation is the vajra palace,

original: zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: the moon and vajra union

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par gnas //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par gnas //
translated: fully abiding in the source of phenomena.

original: sna tshogs padma'i dkyil nyid du //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i dkyil nyid du //
translated: In the center of a variegated lotus,

original: zla ba yi ge bcu drug bcas //
analyzed: zla ba yi ge bcu drug bcas //
translated: the moon with the sixteen vowels,

original: re pha las byung gnyis pa las //
analyzed: re pha las byung gnyis pa las //
translated: from the second Ra, arisen from Re,

original: gsal byed yi ge khor yug blta //
analyzed: gsal byed yi ge khor yug blta //
translated: the surrounding consonants are seen.

original: @72b ro mnyam pa la sa bon nyid //
analyzed: @72b ro mnyam pa la sa bon nyid //
translated: The seed is in the equalizing taste,

original: nor bu rdo rje spro dang bsdu //
analyzed: nor bu rdo rje spro dang bsdu //
translated: the jewel and vajra are emanating and gathering.

original: nga rgyal gyur pas rdo rje sems //
analyzed: nga rgyal gyur pas rdo rje sems //
translated: Through the transformation of pride, there is Vajrasattva,

original: dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal //
analyzed: dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal //
translated: with white, black, and red faces,

original: shes rab gnyis med sgeg dang stangs //
analyzed: shes rab gnyis med sgeg dang stangs //
translated: with wisdom and non-dual charm and posture,

original: gdug dang dur khrod rgyan gyis spras //🔽gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag / rdo rje ral gri g-yas na bsnams //
analyzed: gdug dang dur khrod rgyan gyis spras // gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag / rdo rje ral gri g-yas na bsnams //
translated: adorned with the ornaments of the charnel ground,🔽with a flaying knife and skull-cup in the primary hands,🔽holding a vajra and sword in the right hands,

original: g-yon na 'khor lo chu skyes so //
analyzed: g-yon na 'khor lo chu skyes so //
translated: and a chakram and lotus in the left hands.

original: sa bon 'od kyi bdag nyid dpal //
analyzed: sa bon 'od kyi bdag nyid dpal //
translated: The seed is the nature of light, glorious,

original: rjes su gyur pas khu bar blta //
analyzed: rjes su gyur pas khu bar blta //
translated: seen as the seminal essence through transformation.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gnas //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gnas //
translated: The abode of the vajra body, speech, and mind,

original: nyi ma dmar po ya gcig bcas //🔽gyur pas rdo rje sngon po ste //
analyzed: nyi ma dmar po ya gcig bcas // gyur pas rdo rje sngon po ste //
translated: the single-faced red sun,🔽through transformation, the blue vajra,

original: sa bon 'od las gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: sa bon 'od las gshin rje gshed //
translated: from the light of the seed, is Yamantaka,🔽the color of a young rain cloud,

original: char sprin gzhon nu lta bu'i mdog / g-yas pa zla ba lta bu ste //
analyzed: char sprin gzhon nu lta bu'i mdog / g-yas pa zla ba lta bu ste //
translated: with a right face like the moon,🔽and a left face like the sun.

original: g-yon pa padma r'a ga'i mdog / rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i sku //
analyzed: g-yon pa padma r'a ga'i mdog / rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i sku //
translated: He is in union with his consort.

original: rtsa ba'i phyag gis 'khyud pa'i stangs //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i phyag gis 'khyud pa'i stangs //
translated: He embraces her with his main hands.🔽He holds a vajra, sword, wheel,

original: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // padma 'od zer chen po 'bar //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // padma 'od zer chen po 'bar //
translated: and lotus, blazing with great light rays.🔽He holds a flaying knife marked with a vajra

original: gri gug rdo rje mtshan pa dang // thod pa byang chub sems bkang ba //
analyzed: gri gug rdo rje mtshan pa dang // thod pa byang chub sems bkang ba //
translated: and a skull-cup filled with bodhicitta.

original: yum dang mtshungs par 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: yum dang mtshungs par 'dzin pa ste //
translated: He holds these in a manner similar to the consort.

original: gcer bu rgyan bral skra grol ba'o //
analyzed: gcer bu rgyan bral skra grol ba'o //
translated: He is naked, without ornaments, and his hair is loose.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i stangs dang ldan //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i stangs dang ldan //
translated: He is in union with his consort.

original: brgya phyed mgo bo'i phreng ba can //🔽padma zla ba'i gdan stengs su //
analyzed: brgya phyed mgo bo'i phreng ba can // padma zla ba'i gdan stengs su //
translated: He has a garland of fifty heads.🔽He sits on a seat of lotus and moon.

original: ma he nyi ma gnas pa'i stengs //
analyzed: ma he nyi ma gnas pa'i stengs //
translated: He sits on a sun and water buffalo seat.

original: rdo rje gshed po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje gshed po bsgom par bya //
translated: Meditate on Vajrabhairava.

original: sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yis //
translated: With body, speech, and mind,

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje bde bar bsgom //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje bde bar bsgom //
translated: meditate on the bliss of the sattva-vajra.

original: skye mched zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: skye mched zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: The sense bases are the moon maṇḍala.

original: sems dpa'i yi ge gsal bar bya //
analyzed: sems dpa'i yi ge gsal bar bya //
translated: The sattva syllable is made clear.

original: kshim dzim kham gam kam sam //
analyzed: kshim dzim kham gam kam sam //
translated: KṢIṂ JHIṂ KHAṂ GHAṂ KAṂ SAṂ

original: spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying ga'i steng //
analyzed: spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying ga'i steng //
translated: On the crown, throat, and heart.

original: zla ba padma nyid ma'i dkyil //
analyzed: zla ba padma nyid ma'i dkyil //
translated: The moon, lotus, and sun maṇḍalas

original: dkar dmar gnag pa'i yi ge dgong //
analyzed: dkar dmar gnag pa'i yi ge dgong //
translated: are the white, red, and black syllables.

original: aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.🔽

original: sa bon las 'phros gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: sa bon las 'phros gshin rje gshed //
translated: From the seed syllables, Yamāntaka

original: yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba yis //
translated: is in union with the mother in nondual union.

original: bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun //
analyzed: bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun //
translated: The stream of bodhicitta of great bliss

original: phab ste spyi gtsug bab gyur pas //
analyzed: phab ste spyi gtsug bab gyur pas //
translated: descends and enters the crown.

original: dri med dag pas rdo rje sems //
analyzed: dri med dag pas rdo rje sems //
translated: The pure, stainless one is Vajrasattva.

original: spros dang bsdus pas de nyid don //
analyzed: spros dang bsdus pas de nyid don //
translated: The meaning of that is the emanation and dissolution.

original: mnyes par byas la rgyud la bstim //
analyzed: mnyes par byas la rgyud la bstim //
translated: Having pleased, dissolve into the continuum.🔽The definite, clear, and stable

original: nges dang gsal dang brtan pa dang // phab la thig le thig le che //
analyzed: nges dang gsal dang brtan pa dang // phab la thig le thig le che //
translated: are the descent, the bindu, and the great bindu.

original: byed pa sbyor dang phra ma dang // go rims nam mkha'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: byed pa sbyor dang phra ma dang // go rims nam mkha'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The application, the subtle, and the sequence are the vajra of space.

original: 'di ni 'grub med 'grub pa med //
analyzed: 'di ni 'grub med 'grub pa med //
translated: This is not accomplished, but is nonaccomplished.

original: rang bzhin nyid nas rdo rje sems //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid nas rdo rje sems //
translated: From the nature itself, it is Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje nam mkha'i khams sbyor bas //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha'i khams sbyor bas //
translated: The union of the vajra and the element of space

original: gnyis med ye shes chos kyi sku //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes chos kyi sku //
translated: is the nondual gnosis, the dharmakāya.

original: 'di ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This is the complete purity.

original: ldang ba s'a lu'i 'bras ltar du //
analyzed: ldang ba s'a lu'i 'bras ltar du //
translated: The rising is like the fruit of the śāla tree.

original: gnas pa rgyal po'i dbang bsgyur zhing //
analyzed: gnas pa rgyal po'i dbang bsgyur zhing //
translated: The abiding is like the dominion of a king.

original: dbyings kyi rdo rje tha mi dang // sbyor ba'i byang chub @73a * //🔽sems phab pas //
analyzed: dbyings kyi rdo rje tha mi dang // sbyor ba'i byang chub @73a * // sems phab pas //
translated: and the bodhicitta of union.

original: sa stengs sa 'og sa bla yi //
analyzed: sa stengs sa 'og sa bla yi //
translated: In the realms above, below, and on the earth,

original: gnas su sku gsung thugs bsams te //
analyzed: gnas su sku gsung thugs bsams te //
translated: one should contemplate the body, speech, and mind.

original: ma yengs don grub bzlas par bya //
analyzed: ma yengs don grub bzlas par bya //
translated: One should recite without distraction, for the sake of accomplishment.

original: aom k'a la r'u pa h'um /
analyzed: aom k'a la r'u pa h'um /
translated: Oṃ kālarūpa hūṃ.

original: 'dis ni brgya byin la sogs pa brgyal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni brgya byin la sogs pa brgyal bar byed pa'o //
translated: By this, Indra and so forth will faint.

original: aom ya ma r'a dza /
analyzed: aom ya ma r'a dza /
translated: Oṃ yama rāja

original: sa do me ya /
analyzed: sa do me ya /
translated: sadomāya

original: ya me do ru /
analyzed: ya me do ru /
translated: yama medori

original: na yo da ya /🔽ya da yo ni: ra ya kshe ya /
analyzed: na yo da ya / ya da yo ni: ra ya kshe ya /
translated: nayodāya🔽yamadayo niḥ🔽rā yakṣe ya

original: ya kshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
analyzed: ya kshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
translated: yama yakṣe ca ni rā mā ya

original: hu'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: hu'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'dis ni dngos grub chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni dngos grub chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will attain even the great accomplishments.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śrīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'dis ni las thams cad 'grub po //
analyzed: 'dis ni las thams cad 'grub po //
translated: By this, all activities are accomplished.

original: ha cang drag min dal ba min //
analyzed: ha cang drag min dal ba min //
translated: Not too intense, not slow,

original: cung zad ring ba ma yin te //
analyzed: cung zad ring ba ma yin te //
translated: not a little long,

original: thung dang mi gsal rnams spangs te //
analyzed: thung dang mi gsal rnams spangs te //
translated: avoiding short and unclear,

original: tshig gi bar du ma chod pa'i //
analyzed: tshig gi bar du ma chod pa'i //
translated: without interrupting the words,

original: chen pos bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: chen pos bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: The great one accomplishes the recitation.

original: 'di ni bsgrub pa'i don du byas //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgrub pa'i don du byas //
translated: This was composed for the sake of accomplishment.

original: las kun bla ma brgyud shes bya //
analyzed: las kun bla ma brgyud shes bya //
translated: All activities should be known from the guru lineage.

original: mi shes pa dag dgrol ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mi shes pa dag dgrol ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of liberating the ignorant,

original: bdag gis rtogs par gyur pa brtsams //
analyzed: bdag gis rtogs par gyur pa brtsams //
translated: I have begun to understand this.

original: 'di las 'byung ba'i bsod nams kyis //
analyzed: 'di las 'byung ba'i bsod nams kyis //
translated: By the merit arising from this,🔽May I become glorious Yamāntaka.

original: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed 'gyur shog / sangs rgyas gshen rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed 'gyur shog / sangs rgyas gshen rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Sādhana of Buddha Black Yamāri

original: n'a da ku be ra las byung ba'i don /
analyzed: n'a da ku be ra las byung ba'i don /
translated: The meaning that arose from Nādakubera🔽The great scholar and yogi, Śrī Nāgārjuna, composed this while residing in Kunadrakṣetra.

original: kun da nakshe ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: kun da nakshe ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It is complete.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a sh'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a sh'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
translated: The yogi Prajñāśrījñānakīrti made this his own translation.
